text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Marketing Manager, OAP and Operations Sports Media Posted/Updated: 10-09-2015 Brief Job Description: This person works closely with Production and Creative colleagues to ensure that on-air elements and graphics are delivered according to plans. This person works closely with the marketing managers to ensure that execution of all digital marketing plans, sales   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
